text: Broadway is a 1964 studio album by Johnny Mathis. It was released on August 28, 2012 through Mercury Records after being shelved for 48 years. It was publicly made available after Sony Music Entertainment released it on 2CD pack. ==Track listing== # "Ain't It de Truth" from Jamaica (Harold Arlen, E.Y.
